memberdef.definition: typedef void(* monitor_data_cb_t) (uint8_t *data, int len, hal_wifi_link_info_t *info)
memberdef.name: monitor_data_cb_t

detaileddescription.para: Get the default wifi instance. The system may have more than one wifi instance, this API returns the default one.

simplesect.para: Instance pointer, or NULL if no instance registered.

detaileddescription.para: Regster a wifi instance to the HAL framework.

parameterdescription.para: the wifi instance.

detaileddescription.para: Initialize wifi instances.

simplesect.para: This is supposed to be called during system boot, not supposed to be called by user module directly.

detaileddescription.para: Get the MAC address of the specified wifi instance.

parameterdescription.para: the wifi instance, NULL if default.
the place to hold the result.

detaileddescription.para: Start the wifi instance.

parameterdescription.para: the wifi instance, NULL if default.
the config used to start the wifi.

detaileddescription.para: Start the wifi instance in anvanced way (more config specified).

parameterdescription.para: the wifi instance, NULL if default.
the advanced config used to start the wifi.

detaileddescription.para: Get the status of the specified wifi instance, e.g. the IP, mask, dhcp mode, etc.

parameterdescription.para: the wifi instance, NULL if default.
the place to hold the results.
SOFT_AP or STATION.

detaileddescription.para: Get the link status of the wifi instance ,e.g. ssid, bssid, channel, rssi, etc.

parameterdescription.para: the wifi instance, NULL if default.
the place to hold the results.

detaileddescription.para: Start the scanning of the specified wifi instance.

parameterdescription.para: the wifi instance, NULL if default.

detaileddescription.para: Start the scanning of the specified wifi instance in advanced way.

parameterdescription.para: the wifi instance, NULL if default.

detaileddescription.para: Power off the wifi instance.

parameterdescription.para: the wifi instance, NULL if default.

detaileddescription.para: Power on the wifi instance.

parameterdescription.para: the wifi instance, NULL if default.

detaileddescription.para: Suspend the wifi instance.

parameterdescription.para: the wifi instance, NULL if default.

detaileddescription.para: Suspend the wifi instance in station mode.

parameterdescription.para: the wifi instance, NULL if default.

detaileddescription.para: Suspend the wifi instance in soft_ap mode.

parameterdescription.para: the wifi instance, NULL if default.

detaileddescription.para: Set the channel of the wifi instance.

parameterdescription.para: the wifi instance, NULL if default.

detaileddescription.para: Start the monitor mode of the wifi instance.

parameterdescription.para: the wifi instance, NULL if default.

detaileddescription.para: Stop the monitor mode of the wifi instance.

parameterdescription.para: The wifi instance, NULL if default.

detaileddescription.para: Register the montior callback on the wifi instance.

parameterdescription.para: the wifi instance, NULL if default.
the callback function.

detaileddescription.para: Start debug mode of the wifi instance.

parameterdescription.para: the wifi instance, NULL if default.

detaileddescription.para: Stop debug mode of the wifi instance.

parameterdescription.para: the wifi instance, NULL if default.

detaileddescription.para: Set the event callback function array for the wifi. Please don't do time consuming work in these callbacks.

simplesect.para: Please don't do time consuming work in these callbacks.

parameterdescription.para: the wifi instance, NULL for default.
the event callback function info.
